idea-plugin.name: C/C++ Coverage
idea-plugin.change-notes:
2019.3.0:
Changed naming scheme. First two Fields match CLion version plugin is ment for and last field is incremented per release
Branch coverage column does not show anymore if branch coverage was not generated when running
Fixed Bug with GCC 9 Coverage not working with Ninja Generator
Switched from Intellij Threadpool to creating Threads yielding better performance in 2019.3
New option to choose if Coverage should be calculated for sources not part of the project (default: Off)
Bug fixes with WSL sometimes not working fixed as well as branch coverage for Lambdas when using LLVM
idea-plugin.description:
C and C++ Line, Region and Branch Coverage gatherer for GCC and Clang. Automatically gathers line, region and branch coverage and displays it in editor and a statistic window. To use compile with --coverage and link against gcov when using GCC or compile with -fprofile-instr-generate -fcoverage-mapping and use linker option -fprofile-instr-generate when using Clang.
For further details, known issues and differences of compilers see https://github.com/zero9178/GCoverage4CLion/blob/master/README.md
